Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using fibroblasts derived from patients.

Readout description.Result Description: Complex I activity was reduced by approximately 60% for the variant NM_004493.3:c.536T>C.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were used for all experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: An empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Complex I activity within the normal range.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using fibroblasts derived from patients.

Readout description.Result Description: A reduced band intensity for NDUFS1 was observed when compared to controls for the variant NM_004493.3:c.536T>C.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were used for all experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: An empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: NDUFS1 band intensity within the normal range.
